name: A Gentlemanly Adventure
description: A Gentlemanly Adventure follows the journey of Sir Reginald Cadwaller, who after injuring himself during a hunting accident wakes up in a very different world. Thrust into the dangerous events that are sweeping the land, Reginald must find the strength inside himself to be the hero the people need.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Any Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: If you can't run this game you might be using an actual potato.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
